*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Grant to Austin, July 24, 1825. Trade with Mexico.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Reynosa */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-24-1825">24th July 1825*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Colnl Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*,*/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p* *p*I have been much longer detained in this *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*than I had any Idea of when I started from your *location_mentioned*settlement*/location_mentioned*, It was Six Weeks, before we reached *location_mentioned*Refugio*/location_mentioned*, and have been longer in Settling my business than I had any Idea of. I then went up the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*and bought Some Wool to bring on to the *location_mentioned*Settlement */location_mentioned*but by high waters and loosing Mules and Horses, it is only the other day I was able to get my Cargos and Mules Collected in *location_mentioned*Camargo */location_mentioned*to start, but am again prevented by high waters all the *location_mentioned*Water Courses*/location_mentioned* are up so that mules with Cargo cannot proceed and I am uncertain when I will be able to travel with my cargo there has been a great deal of Rain in this *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*the *location_mentioned*Rio Grande*/location_mentioned* is very high and likewise the *location_mentioned*Nueces*/location_mentioned*; and as I am unable to proceed, I have concluded to go down to *location_mentioned*Refugio */location_mentioned*and purchase a few goods, to see if I can make up my lost time; I shall be with you as soon as it is practicable; as I have since I first saw the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*been determined to become a *person_mentioned*Settler*/person_mentioned*; and have refused some good offers to make money, in consequence of making all my arrangements to go and settle with you; I hope *person_mentioned*Captn Jones*/person_mentioned* has attended to my business and that all things are well my absence from the *location_mentioned*Colonies */location_mentioned*has not been my fault; which I know you are sensible of— If *person_mentioned*Captn Jones */person_mentioned*has not been able to pay you the balance; I will settle with you to your satisfaction.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Grant*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
